./bp_top/src/include/bp_cfg_link_pkg.vh Cov: 100% 

   1: 
   2: package bp_cfg_link_pkg;
   3: 
   4:   `include "bp_cfg_link_defines.vh"
   5: 
   6:   // The overall memory map of the config link is:
   7:   //   16'h0000 - 16'h001f: chip level config
   8:   //   16'h0020 - 16'h003f: fe config
   9:   //   16'h0040 - 16'h005f: be config
  10:   //   16'h0060 - 16'h007f: me config
  11:   //   16'h0080 - 16'h00ff: reserved
  12:   //   16'h8000 - 16'h8fff: cce ucode
  13:   // Specific cfg registers
  14:   //   16'h0000      = clk_osc
  15:   //   16'h0001      = reset
  16:   //   16'h0002      = freeze
  17:   //   16'h0040      = start_pc low  32 bits
  18:   //   16'h0041      = start_pc high 32 bits
  19:   //   16'h0060      = cce_mode
  20:   //   16'h8000-8fff = cce ucode
  21: 
  22:   localparam bp_cfg_base_addr_gp          = 'h0100_0000;
  23:   localparam bp_cfg_reg_clk_osc_gp        = 'h0000;
  24:   localparam bp_cfg_reg_reset_gp          = 'h0001;
  25:   localparam bp_cfg_reg_freeze_gp         = 'h0002;
  26:   localparam bp_cfg_reg_icache_mode_gp    = 'h0022;
  27:   localparam bp_cfg_reg_start_pc_lo_gp    = 'h0040;
  28:   localparam bp_cfg_reg_start_pc_hi_gp    = 'h0041;
  29:   localparam bp_cfg_reg_dcache_mode_gp    = 'h0042;
  30:   localparam bp_cfg_reg_cce_mode_gp       = 'h0060;
  31:   localparam bp_cfg_reg_num_lce_gp        = 'h0061;
  32:   localparam bp_cfg_mem_base_cce_ucode_gp = 'h8000;
  33: 
  34: endpackage
  35: 
  36:
